mean_cn: adj.自然的；物质的；物理的；身体的n. 体格检查
sentence: Physical exercise is good for the body and the mind.
sentence_tra: 体育锻炼有益身心健康。

mean_cn: adj. 时常的, 频繁的;
sentence: Why are his questions so frequent?
sentence_tra: 为什么他提出的问题这么频繁？

mean_cn: n. 内容, 目录;  满足;  adj.  满足的;v.  使满意
sentence: You can get a brief idea of a book from the table of contents.
sentence_tra: 你可以从目录页了解一本书的大致内容。

sentence: We have a responsibility to take care of our parents.
sentence_tra: 我们有责任照顾父母。

mean_cn: n.阻塞，果酱v.(使)阻塞，使塞满
sentence: The mall is jammed with people.
sentence_tra: 商场挤满了人。

sentence: It's a busy street, so you should cross at the crossing.
sentence_tra: 这是条繁忙的大街，你必须走人行横道过马路。

mean_cn: adj.有可能；可信的；适合的adv.很可能
sentence: If you see dark clouds, it's likely that it will rain.
sentence_tra: 如果你看到乌云，可能会下雨。

mean_cn: n. 体型；人物；形状；数字v.想出，估计，计算出
sentence: I maintain my figure by eating well and exercising.
sentence_tra: 我通过合理膳食和锻炼保持身材。

mean_cn: adj. 百分度的;  摄氏的;  n. 摄氏度
sentence: Flowers would be nicely treated at 25 degrees centigrade.
sentence_tra: 25摄氏度对花朵（的生长）有益。

sentence: We will ride bicycles up the mountain.
sentence_tra: 我们将要骑车上山。

sentence: He made a huge amount of money.
sentence_tra: 他挣了一大笔钱。

mean_cn: n. 可靠的人;  adj. 可靠的, 可以信赖的;
sentence: I hope the guy holding this rope is reliable.
sentence_tra: 我希望攥着绳子的这家伙是可靠的。

sentence: The doctor used an X-ray to look for any damage to my bones.
sentence_tra: 医生用X光来检查我骨头的损伤。

sentence: I don't usually like shopping, but when there are sales, I buy everything!
sentence_tra: 我通常不喜欢购物，但打折的时候我什么都买！

sentence: Please give me the timetable for the flights.
sentence_tra: 请给我航班时刻表。

mean_cn: n. 邻里情谊;  邻近的地区;  地区;  社区;
sentence: I live in a friendly neighbourhood where everyone knows each other.
sentence_tra: 我住在一个友好的社区里，那里每个人都互相认识。

sentence: We are hopeful that the baby will be healthy.
sentence_tra: 我们希望婴儿出生健康。

mean_cn: phr.上升; 被建立; 被炸毁;
sentence: This elevator is going up.
sentence_tra: 电梯正在上升。

sentence: I rely a lot on my daughter's help.
sentence_tra: 我很依靠女儿的帮助。

mean_cn: phr. 计算出; 锻炼; 计划; 解决;
sentence: It didn't take long for the teacher to work out the math problem on the board.
sentence_tra: 老师不用花很长时间就能在黑板上解出这道数学题。

mean_cn: n. 插入物;  插页;  vt. 插入, 嵌入;
sentence: Just insert your credit card into the ATM and you will receive your money shortly.
sentence_tra: 只要把卡插进取款机你就能很快取到钱了。

sentence: One plus one equals two... Hopefully you knew that.
sentence_tra: 1+1=2，希望你能懂这个。

mean_cn: n. 石油 ;  vt. 加汽油;
sentence: There is no convenience stores at this petrol station.
sentence_tra: 这家加油站里没有便利店。

sentence: Let's take the minibus there; it's much more convenient.
sentence_tra: 我们坐面包车过去吧？那要方便得多。

sentence: The criminal was caught, therefore he went to jail.
sentence_tra: 罪犯已经被抓住了，因此他被送入了监狱。

sentence: If you drive at 130 kilometers per hour, the police will arrest you.
sentence_tra: 如果你开车时速130，警察会逮捕你。

sentence: The sunlight brightens the green field.
sentence_tra: 阳光照亮了绿地。

mean_cn: vi. 占有;  vt. 占据;  占领;
sentence: That's how Chinese college students occupy the seats.
sentence_tra: 中国大学生就是这样占座的。

mean_cn: v.逮捕，拘留；吸引n.逮捕，拘留
sentence: The police officer arrested the man for drunk driving.
sentence_tra: 警察以酒后驾车为由逮捕这个人。

mean_cn: adj. 敏感的，灵敏的，感官的；易受伤害的
sentence: This area here is very sensitive - it hurts when I chew.
sentence_tra: 这个区域很敏感，当我咀嚼的时候会痛。

sentence: We put our baggage in the back of the car.
sentence_tra: 我们把行李放在车的后备箱里。

sentence: I spend my morning playing golf.
sentence_tra: 早上我在打高尔夫球。

sentence: I work in construction - I build houses.
sentence_tra: 我在建筑行业工作―我盖房子。

mean_cn: adj. 凶猛的;  猛烈的;  狂热的;
sentence: Male animals can be fierce when they fight over females.
sentence_tra: 当雄性动物为了雌性动物而打架时，它们会变得异常凶猛！

sentence: A thief broke into my car last night.
sentence_tra: 小偷昨晚闯进我的车。

mean_cn: n.平面；公寓adj.平坦的；浅的；单调的adv.干脆地
sentence: My new flat screen TV takes up much less space.
sentence_tra: 我的新平板电视占了很少的空间。

mean_cn: pron. 无论哪个； 无论哪些
sentence: I will have whichever drink is most delicious.
sentence_tra: 无论哪种饮料，只要是最好喝的就行。

mean_cn: adj. 不抽烟的；禁止抽烟的
sentence: Excuse me, sir. Can't you see the sign? This is a non-smoking area.
sentence_tra: 请原谅，先生。你看不见标志吗？这是禁烟区。

sentence: Carbon monoxide from car exhaust is poisonous to breathe.
sentence_tra: 汽车排放的一氧化碳对呼吸是有毒的。

sentence: She's fed up with her computer because it never does what she tells it to.
sentence_tra: 她厌倦了她的电脑，因为它从不听话。

sentence: A good air hostess is friendly and helpful.
sentence_tra: 优秀的空姐既友好又热心。

sentence: Sometimes I eat pre-cooked meals, for convenience.
sentence_tra: 有时我会为了方便吃预先处理过的食品。

sentence: Please open your books to the first chapter.
sentence_tra: 请翻开你的书到第一章。

sentence: Please walk on the pavement, not the grass.
sentence_tra: 请在人行道上行走，不要践踏草坪。

mean_cn: n. 套服;  请求;  诉讼;  vi. 合适;  vt. 适宜于;  使穿上套服;
sentence: Don't you think I look good in this suit?
sentence_tra: 你不觉得我穿这衣服很帅吗？

mean_cn: n.步行者，行人adj.平庸无奇的，无聊的
sentence: Pedestrians crossing the road must look both ways.
sentence_tra: 过马路的行人一定要注意两边。

mean_cn: adv.由于某种原因，不知怎么的
sentence: Somehow, I must make the baby stop crying.
sentence_tra: 我不知道该怎么办，但我得让这小孩别哭了。

mean_cn: n. 西北;  西北方;  adj. 在西北的;  向西北的;  来自西北的;  adv. 在西北;  向西北;  自西北;
sentence: I am a farmer waist drummer from the northwest.
sentence_tra: 俺是大西北农民腰鼓手。

sentence: We walked through the old tunnel, and hoped it would not collapse.
sentence_tra: 我们从这条古老的隧道走过，并希望它不会倒塌。

mean_cn: n.渡船，渡口v.运送，渡运(人、车或物等)
sentence: We took the ferry down the river.
sentence_tra: 我们乘坐了渡船顺流而下。

sentence: My pants are so loose that I need to wear a belt.
sentence_tra: 我的裤子太宽松了所以我需要系一条腰带。

sentence: Everyone would benefit from more money.
sentence_tra: 钱多了以后每个人都能从中受益。

mean_cn: n.口音，腔调；重音；重音符号v.重读
sentence: The foreigner has such a funny accent when he speaks Chinese!
sentence_tra: 这个老外说中文时口音好奇怪！

mean_cn: n.例子；箱子；情况v. 包围；把…装于容器中
sentence: As a lawyer, I have lots of cases to deal with.
sentence_tra: 作为一个律师，我有大量的案件需要处理。

mean_cn: n.印记，印象，感觉，感想，压痕
sentence: I think I made a good first impression when I met him at the park.
sentence_tra: 我想当我在公园遇到他时给了他一个很好的第一印象。

sentence: The chemical plant releases poisonous gas into the air.
sentence_tra: 化工厂释放有毒的气体到空气中。

mean_cn: n. 木屑, 碎片;  缺口;  圆形筹码;  芯片;  vi. 碎裂;  vt. 削, 凿;  将…削成、凿成;
sentence: There are many wood chips on the floor.
sentence_tra: 地板上有很多木屑。

sentence: I like driving on this part of the highway.
sentence_tra: 我喜欢在这段高速路上开车。

mean_cn: adj. 太阳的；太阳系的；日光的
sentence: Solar energy is necessary for life.
sentence_tra: 太阳能是生命所需。

sentence: Her touch was gentle and soft.
sentence_tra: 她的抚摸是温和并轻柔的。

sentence: That motorcycle has a big motor.
sentence_tra: 那辆摩托车有一个很大的发动机。

sentence: The worst part of driving is finding parking.
sentence_tra: 开车最烦人的就是找停车位。

sentence: The cyclist was determined to win the race.
sentence_tra: 这名车手决心赢得这场比赛。

mean_cn: n.女主人，女主持人，女服务员（乘务员）
sentence: A hostess will help you if you have any problems.
sentence_tra: 如果你遇到任何问题，空姐会来帮你的。

mean_cn: v.拔出, 离开, 度过难关, 恢复健康

sentence_tra: 交战后，部队坐直升机撤退了。

sentence: We'll be stuck in this traffic jam for hours!
sentence_tra: 我们将会被堵上好几个小时！

sentence: The workers argue about whose fault the mistake was.
sentence_tra: 员工们在争论错误是谁犯的。

mean_cn: n. (特命全权)大使;  特使;  代表;
sentence: "Our country wishes to have peace," said the ambassador.
sentence_tra: “我们国家渴望和平。” 大使说道。

sentence: It's very foolish to play around with guns.
sentence_tra: 这样玩枪是很蠢的！

mean_cn: vi. 增值;  vt. 赏识;  为…表示感激;  领会;  使增值;
sentence: He appreciated a spoof painting, but he didn't realize that.
sentence_tra: 他没有意识到这是一幅恶搞图，还很欣赏它。

sentence: My coworkers told me that I did, indeed, do a good job.
sentence_tra: 我的同事告诉我真的干得不错！

sentence: According to my schedule, I have almost nothing to do today.
sentence_tra: 从我的时间表来看，我今天几乎没什么事做。

sentence: This cemetery holds all America's war dead - so far.
sentence_tra: 到目前为止，这片墓地沉睡着所有美国战争的亡魂。

mean_cn: phr. 发生;  举行;  来;
sentence: The American presidential election will take place in November 2012.
sentence_tra: 美国总统大选将在2012年11月举行。

sentence: I've taken my old suitcase to nearly every country in the world.
sentence_tra: 我已经带着我的旧手提箱几乎走遍了世界上所有国家。

mean_cn: n. 散文, 随笔, 文章;
sentence: I'm a merit student and I like writing essays. Bravo!
sentence_tra: 我是学霸我爱写论文。赞！

sentence: Instant noodles taste horrible, but at least they're convenient.
sentence_tra: 方便面太难吃了，但是至少它们很方便。

sentence: We should admit our mistakes and learn from them.
sentence_tra: 我们应该承认自己的错误并从中吸取教训。

mean_cn: n. 结果, 后果;  结论, 推论;
sentence: The alcohol addiction harms your heath and results in some bad consequences.
sentence_tra: 酗酒有损健康还会导致一些不好的后果。

mean_cn: adv.什么地方都没有；任何地方都不
sentence: Water was nowhere to be found.
sentence_tra: 没有地方可以找到水。

sentence: The kindergarten had many toys for children to play with.
sentence_tra: 幼儿园有很多玩具供孩子们玩。

mean_cn: adj. 入了迷的;  上了瘾的;
sentence: He was so addicted to his game, he didn't eat for days.
sentence_tra: 他过分沉迷于游戏，他好些天没吃饭了。

mean_cn: n. 驾车旅行的人，开汽车的人
sentence: As a regular motorist, I always buy really comfortable cars.
sentence_tra: 作为一个经常驾车旅行的人，我总是买真正舒适的车。

sentence: I damaged my car when I drove off the road.
sentence_tra: 当我开下马路时撞毁了车。

sentence: Wherever you want your package to go, we can deliver it.
sentence_tra: 无论你想让你的行李去哪儿，我们都能传送。

sentence: On average, men are about 177 cm tall.

mean_cn: n.东南(方)，东南部adv.向东南adj.东南方的，东南部的，来自东南的
sentence: It is easy to see the influence of Western culture in Southeast Asia.
sentence_tra: 在东南亚很容易看出西方文化的影响。

sentence: There was a problem with the engine of my car.
sentence_tra: 我车里的引擎出了点问题。

sentence: Ask for the operator--she'll know the right phone number.
sentence_tra: 询问接线员，她会知道正确的号码。

sentence: She left the train and got on to the platform.
sentence_tra: 她下了火车，走上站台。

sentence: The interpreter listens and translates into the microphone.
sentence_tra: 口译员边听边对着麦克风翻译。

sentence: This software will help increase your English vocabulary!
sentence_tra: 这个软件会帮你增加你的英语词汇量。

sentence: She was totally shocked by the big surprise.
sentence_tra: 她被这个巨大的惊喜给震惊了！

mean_cn: n. 声明，陈述；结算单，报表

sentence_tra: 他向记者发表了一份声明。

mean_cn: adv. 正确地;  完全地;

sentence_tra: 我要我的草都完全一样高。

sentence: We saw various types of fish during our dive.
sentence_tra: 在潜水时我们看到了各种各样的鱼。

sentence: Napoleon was the emperor of France.
sentence_tra: 拿破仑曾是法国的皇帝。

mean_cn: n. 蹦极跳，身上系着橡皮带从高处往下跳的游戏

sentence_tra: 兔子都敢蹦极，你喃？

mean_cn: n.隐蔽住，躲避处(常用来指住处)；庇护v.遮蔽，掩护，庇护
sentence: They build shelters from ice to keep themselves warm.
sentence_tra: 他们用冰建造躲避处来抵御严寒。

mean_cn: n.狩猎旅行(特指在非洲东部〕，长途考察；野生动物园
sentence: I went on an African safari and got to play with a lion!
sentence_tra: 我去非洲旅行了一趟，还和狮子玩耍了一盘。

mean_cn: n. 组织体制; 团体, 机构;
sentence: Our organisation has contacts all around the world.
sentence_tra: 我们的机构在全球都有联系。

sentence: Bungee jumping is a good source of excitement.
sentence_tra: 蹦极跳是找刺激的好办法。

mean_cn: n. 独木舟，轻舟v. 乘独木舟，用独木舟运
sentence: We're going down the river in a canoe.
sentence_tra: 我们坐着独木舟沿河而下。

sentence: Do it later? No, young lady, you'll do your homework right now!
sentence_tra: 待会儿再做？不行，小姑娘，你必须马上做完作业！

mean_cn: adj.精疲力竭的；耗尽的，用完的
sentence: I am exhausted after a long day of work.
sentence_tra: 经过一天的工作，我感到精疲力竭。

mean_cn: v.继续开展，坚持，举止失常

sentence_tra: 不要停止你现在做的事情，继续。

sentence: I'm a little bit uncomfortable around my new boss.
sentence_tra: 在我的新老板周围我有点不自在。

mean_cn: n. 富人;  adj. 富有的;  充分的;

sentence_tra: 有钱人家的庶子是不需要有梦想的。

sentence: His skin color differs from the others'.
sentence_tra: 他的肤色和别人的都不一样。

mean_cn: n. 准备, 预备;  准备工作;
sentence: My daughter is very helpful in the kitchen with food preparation.
sentence_tra: 在厨房里准备食物的时候，我女儿能帮很多忙。

sentence: Jumping off a mountain was part of his adventure.
sentence_tra: 他的惊险经历还包括从山上跳下！

mean_cn: adj. 可选择的, 随意的;
sentence: The optional subjects are usually more interesting than majors.
sentence_tra: 选修课通常比必修课更有意思。

sentence: The freeway is the quickest route home.
sentence_tra: 高速公路是最快回家的路。

sentence: This news really amazes me!
sentence_tra: 这条消息真的让我感到很吃惊！

sentence: I gave my teacher an apple in order to make her like me.
sentence_tra: 为了让老师喜欢我，我给了她一个苹果。

mean_cn: adj.累人的；麻烦的；无聊的；引起疲劳的
sentence: Thinking about work all the time is so tiring!
sentence_tra: 一直考虑工作问题是非常累人的！

mean_cn: n. 强烈欲望, 雄心, 抱负;  (具体的)追求目标;  (干)劲;

sentence_tra: 他的雄心是到达顶部。

sentence: Fishing is a sport that requires a lot of patience.
sentence_tra: 钓鱼是一项需要很多耐心的运动。

mean_cn: vi. 通过(渡过；被人了解)
sentence: The kids got across the river using the bridge.
sentence_tra: 孩子们从桥上过了河。

mean_cn: 发生故障；失败；(精神)垮下来
sentence: The man's car broke down, so he has to stop and call for help.
sentence_tra: 这个男人的车抛锚了，所以他不得不停下来寻求帮助。

mean_cn: n. 口授, 口述;  听写;  命令;
sentence: She wanted to write a letter but her hand was injured, so I took her dictation.
sentence_tra: 她想写信但是她的手受伤了，所以她口授我来记录。

sentence: The TV presenter spoke into the camera.
sentence_tra: 电视节目主持人对着镜头说了话。

mean_cn: n. 上级; 少校; 专业;  vi. 专攻;  adj. 较大的; 重要的; 主要的;
sentence: In chess, the king is your most major piece.
sentence_tra: 在国际象棋中，国王是你最重要的棋子。

mean_cn: v. 瞄准；旨在n. 目标；对准
sentence: Aim a little above the target if you want to hit it.
sentence_tra: 如果你想击中靶子，在瞄准的时候往上一点。

mean_cn: n. 适应, 调解, 解决, 乐于助人, 住处, 舱位;
sentence: I am very satisfied with the accommodation!
sentence_tra: 我非常满意这里的住宿！

sentence: We like to take the raft out for a relaxing day in the lake.
sentence_tra: 我们会在湖里划木筏来度过轻松的一天。

mean_cn: n.旅社，招待所（尤指青年旅社）
sentence: It was cheaper to stay at the youth hostel.
sentence_tra: 住青旅会更便宜。

sentence: I have completely run out of money, but I don't remember how.
sentence_tra: 我把钱花光了，但完全不记得是怎么用完的了。

sentence: The criminal was finally caught and put into prison.
sentence_tra: 罪犯最终被捕入了狱。

sentence: I can see the horizon behind the hills.
sentence_tra: 我可以看到小山后面的地平线。

mean_cn: 退出； 放弃； 食言
sentence: I told my girlfriend I would dive, but now I want to back out.
sentence_tra: 我告诉我的女友我要跳水，但现在我想放弃了。

sentence: "Sorry, boss. Yes I know I'm late. I'm on my way right now."
sentence_tra: “抱歉，老板。是的我知道我迟到了。我现在在路上。”

sentence: This porter can carry up to eighty kilos on his back all day.
sentence_tra: 这个搬运工能一整天在他的背上负重八十公斤。

mean_cn: n. 北极;  adj. 北极的;
sentence: Polar bears only live in arctic areas; you can't find them further south.
sentence_tra: 北极熊只生活在北极地区，再往南就没有它们的踪迹了。

sentence: People of all nationalities come together for the Olympic Games.
sentence_tra: 所有国家的人们为奥运欢聚一堂。

mean_cn: phr. 爆发; 发生; 越狱; 摆脱, 逃脱;

sentence_tra: 我们爬过这面墙逃离这里吧。

sentence: He turned up the volume on his phone to listen to music.
sentence_tra: 他把手机音量调大听音乐。

sentence: She observes the liquid very carefully.
sentence_tra: 她观察液体时十分仔细。

sentence: At this altitude it would be dangerous to fall off.

sentence_tra: 当我看到鲨鱼时感到很惊恐。

sentence: She can do very difficult math--what an intelligent girl!
sentence_tra: 她能解出非常难的数学题，真是个聪明的女孩儿！
